remarks: Define the least upper bound (LUB) of a set of (poset) elements.  The domain is restricted to exclude sets ` s ` for which the LUB doesn't exist uniquely.  (Contributed by NM, 12-Sep-2011.)  (Revised by NM, 6-Sep-2018.)
statement:
df-lub $p |- lub = ( p e. _V |-> ( ( s e. ~P ( Base ` p ) |-> ( iota_ x e. ( Base ` p ) ( A. y e. s y ( le ` p ) x /\ A. z e. ( Base ` p ) ( A. y e. s y ( le ` p ) z -> x ( le ` p ) z ) ) ) ) |` { s | E! x e. ( Base ` p ) ( A. y e. s y ( le ` p ) x /\ A. z e. ( Base ` p ) ( A. y e. s y ( le ` p ) z -> x ( le ` p ) z ) ) } ) ) $.
$d p s x y z $.
